ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Assault SMG
ThingDef.description: A CQB/Medium range smg and mid damage manufactured by Shin-Ra S.A.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Long range Burst Rifle with mid damage manufactured by Shin-Ra S.A.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: A Long range sniper Rifle with mid damage manufactured by Shin-Ra S.A.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Grunt Dual Waist Gun
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Close range Dual gun with mid damage manufactured by Shin-Ra S.A for it's Mighty Grunt Power Suits.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Grunt Dual Waist Plasma Launcher
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Close range Dual Plasma Launcher with mid damage that can cause burns or set on fire (Warning will set on fire flora too use with caution.) manufactured by Shin-Ra S.A for it's Mighty Grunt Power Suits.

ThingDef.label: Type-C Cannon
ThingDef.description: The Type-C Cannon was especially designed to being used by the Shin-Ra Heli Gunner Robot Unit, it's the most advanced Cannon of it's line.

ThingDef.label: Crane Bot Ray Cannon
ThingDef.description: The Crane Bot Ray Cannon was especially designed to being used by the Shin-Ra Crane Robot Unit, it's not a very effective weapon but can help the Crane Bot defend itself, longs bursts, very low damage, medium charge time.

ThingDef.label: Type-C Canon
ThingDef.description: The Type-C Canon was especially designed to being used by the Shin-Ra Heli Gunner Robot Unit, it's the most advanced canon of it's line.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra 80mm Cannon
ThingDef.description: This 80mm Cannon was especially designed to being used by the Shin-Ra Tank Bot Robot Unit.

ThingDef.label: Rufus Sawed-off Shotgun
ThingDef.description: Because Rufus can't be without his Shooty friend,an standard sawed-off shotgun modified by Rufus Shinra to be more deadlier.

ThingDef.label: Gelnika Bomber bombardment Targeter
ThingDef.description: A Gelnika SpaceBomber will come from one of the Shin-Ra Company Carriers to do a pass by bombardment on the designated area.

ThingDef.label: SOLDIER Sword
ThingDef.description: Standard Issued SOLDIER Melee Weapon.

ThingDef.label: Buster Sword
ThingDef.description: A legendary weapon used by Angeal Hewley, one of the best SOLDIER members until his death,"Embrace your dreams and defend your honor as member of SOLDIER" was his motto, this sword has been also used by Zack Fair, other excelent member of SOLDIER and Cloud Strife ,an axpirant to SOLDIER, it was lost some time ago, but little is known of how it reached the Rimworlds.

ThingDef.label: Musamune
ThingDef.description: A legendary weapon used by Sephiroth, One of the first members of SOLDIER and the best of them,Sephiroth was created by the Jenova Proyect, and was the first SOLDIER on having Jenova cells by born, not much it's known of him after his dissapearance after he discovered how he was created, How this weapon reached the Rimworlds?, no one knows.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako Pistol
ThingDef.description: A Close range Mako pistol with high damage manufactured by Shin-Ra Company,Certain Space Program Director loved it.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako SMG
ThingDef.description: A Close range Mako SMG with high damage manufactured by Shin-Ra Company.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako Rifle
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Long range Mako Rifle with high damage manufactured by Shin-Ra Company.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako Ray Cannon
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Long range Mako Ray Canon, this is the one of the heaviest Shin-RA weapons, low damage, very high accuracy and long bursts, requires some time to charge and to cool down, manufactured by Shin-Ra Company.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Mako plasma Launcher
ThingDef.description: A Medium/Long range Mako plasma launcher, this is the one of the heaviest Shin-RA weapons, the proyectile it's a ball of unstable ionized Mako Plasma, High Explosive damage, high accuracy and long recharge time, manufactured by Shin-Ra Company (WARNING: medium sized explosion , can kill the shooter if hits nearby objects!).

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Reglamentary Pistol MK-11
ThingDef.description: Reglamentary pistol of the Shin-Ra Army and Police. The MK-11 is Somewhat weak, has medium range, but it's quick.

ThingDef.label: Shin-Ra Flamethrower
ThingDef.description: Just a conventional Flamethrower, Causes target to set on fire, but also its surroundings, it's very dangerious, low range, low damage with also high reload time.
